ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), Owner_Estimate__c <> 0, or( Owner_Estimate_Q1__c <> 0, Owner_Estimate_Q2__c <> 0, Owner_Estimate_Q3__c <> 0, Owner_Estimate_Q4__c <> 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Use either the Annual Estimate or Quarterly Estimate, not both.
